CLICK HERE TO RSVP or SPONSOR SOIREE This year we’ll be honoring our 2023 Hosts, Journey Brown, a Former Penn State Football Running Back; and the Friends and Family of Caroline Kyle. We’ll be […]

The post Simon’s Soiree 2023 appeared first on - Simon's Heart.
item.content:encoded:
You’re invited to Simon’s Soiree on February 4th, 2023, to be held at Citizens Bank Park, home of the Philadelphia Phillies!

CLICK HERE TO RSVP or SPONSOR SOIREE

This year we’ll be honoring our 2023 Hosts, Journey Brown, a Former Penn State Football Running Back; and the Friends and Family of Caroline Kyle. We’ll be celebrating their commitment and effort to protect hearts and save lives; and raising money to support Simon’s Heart.

Simon’s Heart is 501(c)(3) organization dedicated to preventing sudden cardiac arrest and death in children, teens and young adults. We envision a future in which parents and communities don’t lose children to detectable and treatable heart conditions. RSVP BY CLICKING HERE

The post Simon’s Soiree 2023 appeared first on - Simon's Heart.

Enter to win the golf trip of your life in Pebble Beach. Enjoy music under the stars with The Tim Williams Band. […]

The post Simon Says Golf appeared first on - Simon's Heart.
item.content:encoded:
YOU SWING. WE’LL PROTECT HEARTS AND SAVE LIVES.

Play your own ball. Sample the beer and signature drinks around the course. Join the Phanatic for the Sudden Death Shootout sponsored by M&T Bank. Enter to win the golf trip of your life in Pebble Beach. Enjoy music under the stars with The Tim Williams Band. Compete in the skills challenge.

REGISTER BY CLICKING HERE

The post Simon Says Golf appeared first on - Simon's Heart.

item.title: CPR Jukebox Marathon
item.dc:creator: Sarita Rajpoot
item.description:
Pick a song. Grab a ball. Push to the beat. Surprise, you’re learning CPR. On Sunday, April 18th, 96 Students will meet on zoom to push on a ball to music for 4 Hours. When it’s over, they’ll complete 100,000 compressions + know how to save a life. Pick a teammate, grab a ball from […]

The post CPR Jukebox Marathon appeared first on - Simon's Heart.
item.content:encoded:
Pick a song. Grab a ball. Push to the beat. Surprise, you’re learning CPR. On Sunday, April 18th, 96 Students will meet on zoom to push on a ball to music for 4 Hours. When it’s over, they’ll complete 100,000 compressions + know how to save a life.

Pick a teammate, grab a ball from your closet, and meet us on Zoom. Your team will push on a ball for ten minutes to the beat (hosted by personalities from All Around Entertainment). You don’t have to know CPR. You just need two hands and a little rhythm.

REGISTER

CLICK HERE TO DOWNLOAD OUR CUSTOM CPR JUKEBOX MARATHON ZOOM BACKGROUND

The post CPR Jukebox Marathon appeared first on - Simon's Heart.

item.title: AED Madness Jersey Raffle
item.dc:creator: Sarita Rajpoot
item.description:
One in 3,200 NCAA Division I male basketball players will experience cardiac arrest. An AED is the only thing that can save them. Click to win this raffle and you’ll receive a voucher every month for one year. Yes, that’s twelve new jerseys – your sport, your team, your player, your choice. Each month, you […]

The post AED Madness Jersey Raffle appeared first on - Simon's Heart.
item.content:encoded:
One in 3,200 NCAA Division I male basketball players will experience cardiac arrest. An AED is the only thing that can save them.

Click to win this raffle and you’ll receive a voucher every month for one year. Yes, that’s twelve new jerseys – your sport, your team, your player, your choice. Each month, you will receive $110 from our friends at fanatics.com toward the purchase of an adult or youth jersey. This amount will cover the full cost of a baseball, football, basketball, and soccer (not hockey) jersey.
Tickets: 1/$10 or 3/$25.
Value: $1320
Drawing to be held: April 4th, 2021.
Funds support: AEDs where children learn and play.

Simon’s Heart is an organization dedicated to preventing sudden cardiac arrest and death in children. All contributions are tax-deductible as permitted by law. The official registration and financial information of Simon’s Heart may be obtained from the PA Department of State by calling toll free – 800.732.0999. Registration does not imply endorsement.

REGISTER

The post AED Madness Jersey Raffle appeared first on - Simon's Heart.

item.title: Simon Says Golf Pebble Beach
item.dc:creator: Simon's Fund
item.description:
4 DAYS. 3 COURSES. TWO PEOPLE MEALS. DRINKS SWAG. CANDIES + $1,000 AMEX Gift Card sponsored by Blank Rome. $100/ticket. Only 200 tickets will be sold. Drawing November 11th. A Golfer’s Dream Who are you going to take? It can’t be just anyone. You’re playing at Pebble Beach, Spanish Bay, and Spyglass Hill over three […]

The post Simon Says Golf Pebble Beach appeared first on - Simon's Heart.
item.content:encoded:
• 4 DAYS. 3 COURSES.
  • TWO PEOPLE MEALS. DRINKS SWAG. CANDIES + $1,000 AMEX Gift Card sponsored by Blank Rome.
  • $100/ticket. Only 200 tickets will be sold. Drawing November 11th.

    • A Golfer’s Dream

    Who are you going to take? It can’t be just anyone. You’re playing at Pebble Beach, Spanish Bay, and Spyglass Hill over three days. This is a bucket list item! You can’t take just anyone.

    The Lexus Champions for Charity Annual Event is a priceless experience. You’ll represent Wilkie Lexus and Simon’s Heart as dealerships all across the country send their twosome to compete for prize money. You’ll stay on property, play three rounds of golf, enjoy unlimited food and beverage, and be inundated with swag.

    This golf experience takes place from December 9 – 13. Your raffle ticket includes all greens fees, food and beverage, tons of swag, and a $1,000 gift card for expenses (compliments of Blank Rome). Airfare and hotel are not included. Guests stay on property at Pebble Beach.

    The raffle will be drawn on November 11, 2020. All proceeds benefit Simon’s Heart, a nonprofit that prevents sudden cardiac arrest and death in children, teens, and young adults.

    One ticket is $100 and only 200 tickets will be sold. Last year, tickets sold out. Tickets will be disbursed per $100 donated below.

    Purchase Raffle Tickets Here

    The post Simon Says Golf Pebble Beach appeared first on - Simon's Heart.

item.title: Roast + Toast of Darren Sudman
item.dc:creator: Simon's Fund
item.description:
Darren has led Simon’s Heart for the last 15 years as Co-Founder, Executive Director, and CEO. 18,000+ Hearts Screened. 133 AEDs Provided. 129 Lives Changed. Now, he’s passing the torch. “Let’s make Darren look good before Jenn (the new Executive Director) makes him look bad.” Featuring Roasts and Toasts by Simon’s Heart friends and Celebrity […]

The post Roast + Toast of Darren Sudman appeared first on - Simon's Heart.
item.content:encoded:
Darren has led Simon’s Heart for the last 15 years as Co-Founder, Executive Director, and CEO. 18,000+ Hearts Screened. 133 AEDs Provided. 129 Lives Changed.

Now, he’s passing the torch.

“Let’s make Darren look good before Jenn (the new Executive Director) makes him look bad.”

Featuring Roasts and Toasts by Simon’s Heart friends and Celebrity Guest Joe Matarese. Joe is a Comedian from Philadelphia. He’s appeared on Letterman, America’s Got Talent, Howard Stern, and is a regular on Preston & Steve.

December 3rd, 2020 | 7PM | LIVE Virtual | This Event is Free to Attend

Click here for Free Tickets and Event Information

The post Roast + Toast of Darren Sudman appeared first on - Simon's Heart.

item.title: Baci 5K
item.dc:creator: dsudman
item.description:
The Baci 5K (named after Baci Ristorante in Doylestown) is an annual event to raise money for local nonprofit. Our friends at the restaurant and Sauers Cares selected Simon’s Heart as this year’s beneficiary. Join us on September 13 at Peace Valley Park for what may be the only 5K of the season. The event […]

The post Baci 5K appeared first on - Simon's Heart.
item.content:encoded:
The Baci 5K (named after Baci Ristorante in Doylestown) is an annual event to raise money for local nonprofit. Our friends at the restaurant and Sauers Cares selected Simon’s Heart as this year’s beneficiary. Join us on September 13 at Peace Valley Park for what may be the only 5K of the season. The event is being limited to one hundred participants.

Register for the virtual or live event.

The post Baci 5K appeared first on - Simon's Heart.

item.title: CPR Jukebox Marathon
item.dc:creator: dsudman
item.description:
Over a twelve-hour period, 144 students will push on a ball to music. When it’s over, they’ll know how to save a life. For more information on how to participate or support the students’ efforts, click here. Student teams will register for a ten-minute block over which time they will perform 72,000 compressions. Students of […]

The post CPR Jukebox Marathon appeared first on - Simon's Heart.
item.content:encoded:
Over a twelve-hour period, 144 students will push on a ball to music. When it’s over, they’ll know how to save a life. For more information on how to participate or support the students’ efforts, click here.

Student teams will register for a ten-minute block over which time they will perform 72,000 compressions. Students of ages are welcome. #CPRJukebox

 

 

The post CPR Jukebox Marathon appeared first on - Simon's Heart.
